name: Office Escape (Hayden King)
description:
You're not working over time tonight whether your boss likes it or not! 

You must jump, duck and punch your way though anything between you and your home. Just don't let your boss catch up to you.

Control with the arrow keys up to jump, down to duck and right to punch.

This game was made for the 2019 Global Game Jam, the theme was what does home mean to you.
